featured.text: Amy made sure her gold bracelet was secure on her wrist.
Amy treasured the gold bracelet Laura gave her.

definition.zh_def: 一種佩戴在手腕上的裝飾性物品，通常由金屬、珠寶、皮革或其他材料製成。
definition.en_def: A decorative band worn around the wrist, typically made of metal, jewelry, leather, or other materials.
definition.example: She wore a beautiful silver bracelet to the party.
